step1.title: Welcome to EchoLock
step1.content: EchoLock is a censorship-resistant dead man's switch that automatically releases encrypted messages if you fail to check in regularly. This quick tour will show you the key features.

step2.title: Create a Switch
step2.content: Click here to create your first dead man's switch. You'll set a check-in interval and add an encrypted message.

step3.title: Your Switches
step3.content: All your active switches appear here. Each shows the countdown timer and status.

step4.title: Check In
step4.content: Click 'Check In' to reset the timer and prevent your message from being released. You'll receive email reminders before expiration.

step5.title: Filter & Search
step5.content: Use these controls to filter switches by status, sort, and search by title.

step6.title: Settings & Profile
step6.content: Access your account settings, preferences, and logout from here.

complete.title: Setup Complete
complete.content: You're ready to create your first dead man's switch. Remember to check in regularly.
